body.name: GIM 15W Wireless Charging RGB Gaming Mouse Pad, LED Mouse Pad 800x300x4MM, 10 Light Modes Extra Large Mousepad Non-Slip Rubber Base RGB Desk Mat for Gaming, MacBook, PC, Laptop, Desk

features: 【Built-in Magnetic Wireless Charging for iPhone Series】Support such as Phone 12/iPhone 12 mini/iPhone 12 Pro/iPhone 12 Pro Max, iPhone 13/iPhone 13 mini/iPhone 13 Pro/iPhone 13 Pro Max,iPhone 14/iPhone 14 Pro/iPhone 14 Pro Max/iPhone 14 Plus. Automatic alignment charging after placing the iphone mobile on the wireless charging plate.

【15W Max Fast Qi Wireless Charging Mouse Mat】This Mouse Pad Built-in 15W wireless fast charging compatible with smartphones which support wireless charging such as iPhone 8/X/XR/XS/11/11 Pro, Samsung Galaxy 10/S9/S8 Plus, Galaxy Note 9/8, and all other Qi-enabled devices. (NOTE: 15W need power adapter 9V 2A，But power adapter is not included with this Mouse Pad) .

【10 RGB Led Lighting Modes】GIM RGB Gaming Mouse Pad has super luminous customized 10 lighting modes, including 7 static light modes and 3 dynamic modes, which offers a distinctive atmosphere when playing games or working. The memory function helps to remember your last light mode choice when switched on.

【Large Desk Pad】Large Size 800x300x4MM, GIM extended mouse pad provides a larger usable area to cover keyboard, mouse and other stuffs on the desktop when playing games or office work. At the same time, this mouse pad can protect your desk.

【Anti-Slip Natural Rubber Bottom】With anti-slip base, this mouse pad keeps super firmly on the desk and provides heavy grip. Professional edge stitching combined with waterproof material prevents fraying and ensures longer lifespan. The 4mm thickness ensures its shape stability (thus no wave formation).

【One Touch Control】One control button makes switching the LED modes effortlessly. 3 charging modes indicator - Red for charging, Green for full charged, Yellow for standby mode. One button is designed to switch the light colors on/off. Choose the favorite color mode and enjoy your gaming experience.

【Mouse Pad for Gaming】Our RGB Mouse Pad offers ultra smooth surface, accurate and controllable surface. Provides the optimal surface for gaming sensors and less resistance than other mouse pads. Offers a fast and smooth tracking surface for your mouse. Raised your gaming experience to the higher level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GIM Wireless Charging RGB Gaming Mouse Pad - Illuminate Your Gaming Experience!
reviews.reviewText: The GIM 15W Wireless Charging RGB Gaming Mouse Pad has truly elevated my gaming setup, offering a perfect blend of functionality, style, and innovation. This LED mouse pad has quickly become an essential part of my gaming station, and I'm thoroughly impressed with its performance.The first thing that caught my eye is the vibrant RGB lighting. The array of colors and dynamic lighting effects add an immersive and visually stunning element to my gaming experience. The customizable lighting options allow me to match the pad's aesthetics with my gaming setup, creating a personalized and captivating atmosphere.The wireless charging feature is a game-changer for me. The 15W output provides efficient charging for my Qi-enabled devices, eliminating the need for additional cables cluttering my desk. It seamlessly charges my smartphone or wireless earbuds while I focus on gaming, ensuring that my devices are always ready for action.The generous size of the mouse pad (800x300x4MM) provides ample space for both my mouse and keyboard, creating a unified and organized gaming surface. The smooth and low-friction surface enhances mouse tracking, offering precision and responsiveness during intense gaming sessions.The non-slip rubber base ensures that the mouse pad stays securely in place, even during fast-paced gaming movements. This stability is crucial for maintaining consistent gameplay without any distractions.The build quality is impressive, with reinforced edges that prevent fraying and ensure long-term durability. The pad's thickness adds a comfortable cushioning effect, making it a pleasure to rest my wrists during extended gaming periods.The easy-to-use control button allows for quick adjustments to the RGB lighting effects, brightness, and speed. The intuitive design ensures that customization is straightforward, even for users new to RGB gaming accessories.In conclusion, the GIM Wireless Charging RGB Gaming Mouse Pad is a standout product that combines form and function seamlessly. Whether you're a serious gamer or simply want to enhance your desk setup, this mouse pad delivers on all fronts. The wireless charging capability, stunning RGB lighting, and overall performance make it a five-star addition to any gaming station. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent gaming mouse mat, large, beautiful, bright colors and fast phone charging. A perfect fit for my Alienware keyboard and mouse!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Office buddy was surprised to receive it. He’s a tech guy and head over our media. I left it wrapped on his desk, when I came back in he had it set up, glowing, and charging his phone. I think it hit the mark for his interest, and I’m satisfied with the price and seeing product in hand. 🤜🤛

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice RGB MousePad
reviews.reviewText: Only one annoyance I found in this mousepad so far the charger gets warm so you don't wanna leave it on all day long. However they are aware of the issue and gave solutions to make it be less warm during the charge so thats a plus. Normal USB will make it toasty just plug it into your Red USB if you have them or get a usb adapter thats good. The mousepad otherwise feels great and looks like they fixed one of the complaints it not staying flat mine was instantly flat when i put it on my desk. Does feel slick compared to cheaper mousepads so if you like a smooth surface its good. I feel like to help the heat they should of added more thermal paste and maybe a small fan if they can find a spot. Only suggestions to improve it. Also might notice a factory smell to the mousepad lol hopefully that goes away after awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Husband loves it
reviews.reviewText: The charging port is a really nice touch. It matches the mouse and keyboard set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these pads but I noticed they don't sit flat. I had to bend parts to get to sit flat. These rgbs are on 24/7 never had a problem and I love the qi charging. I think that the 15 watt pad wireless charging is better then the 10 watt. The 15 watt pad is so easy finding the wireless charger cause its raised. And the best is this has samsung fast wireless charging. Apple i don't know about yet. But I do know this has magnetic apple charging. Not on the 10 watt pad. U do need a high powered charger for the fast charge. But other then that there great. I will buy more in the future. Ps I do like the rgbs on the 10 watt pad. And these have usb c. Thats the best the 10 watt pad has micro usb. i have 1 pad with usb c to c and the other pad usb c to usb a.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for bucks.
reviews.reviewText: Not a big fan of charger on the left side. And its not megnatic so ita hard to charging my phone.But led lights are grwat and pad it self is great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great addition to any RGB themed system - love it
reviews.reviewText: I have this RGB mat and it looks great. The colors are pre-determined so you only have a few choices, it would have been nice to have it Aura or have some compatibility with RGB lightning software.I would say it's a little on the expensive side for the limitations but still worth the money if you really want a nice-looking RGB system.
